EmailTemplate.name: External Newsletter.2019-02-21
EmailTemplate.subject: At T-Mobile, Innovation Puts Customers First
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
February 21, 2019 <[[https://pivotal.io/customers/t-mobile?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> At T-Mobile, Innovation Puts Customers First How T-Mobile laid the foundation of its digital future with Pivotal Cloud Foundry. Learn More <[[https://pivotal.io/customers/t-mobile?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/do-you-have-a-good-outcome-oriented-roadmap]]> Do You Have a Good Outcome-Oriented Roadmap? Aloka Penmetcha, Senior Director of Product Management at Pivotal Labs, mapped out six tests she recommends all teams consider using to assess the quality of their outcome-oriented roadmaps. Check it Out <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/do-you-have-a-good-outcome-oriented-roadmap?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/intersect/the-cios-guide-to-kubernetes?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> The CIO's Guide to Kubernetes Learn about what Kubernetes is, why it's so popular, and what it can do for you. Take a Closer Look <[[https://content.pivotal.io/intersect/the-cios-guide-to-kubernetes?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://www.cloudfoundry.org/event/nasummit2019/]]> <https://content.pivotal.io/podcasts/running-spring-boot-apps-on-kubernetes-and-burgers-with-paul-czarkowski?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter> Running Spring Boot Apps on Kubernetes, with Paul Czarkowski In this episode of Pivotal Conversations, Paul Czarkowski walks Coté through running Spring Boot Apps on Kubernetes and more. Listen In <[[https://content.pivotal.io/podcasts/running-spring-boot-apps-on-kubernetes-and-burgers-with-paul-czarkowski?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://www.fastcompany.com/90305252/women-cfos-may-be-in-style-but-what-about-the-rest-of-the-c-suite]]> Fast Company: Women CFOs May Be in Style–But What About the Rest of the C-Suite? Fast Company features our own CFO Cynthia Gaylor as they discuss the progress of women earning roles in the C-suite. Read More <[[https://www.fastcompany.com/90305252/women-cfos-may-be-in-style-but-what-about-the-rest-of-the-c-suite]]> <[[https://springoneplatform.io/2019/cfp?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> SpringOne Platform 2019 Call for Papers is Now Open We’re looking for your stories about crucial cloud topics like platforms, functions, event-driven architecture, microservices, and more for SpringOne Platform 2019. Submit Your Talk Today <[[https://springoneplatform.io/2019/cfp?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <https://content.pivotal.io/intersect/objection-inversion-why-platform-ops-can-create-new-champions-in-it?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter> Why Platform Ops Can Create New Champions in IT With Kubernetes should you use one cluster or multiple? Cornelia Davis, Vice President of Technology, breaks it down. Objection Inversion <[[https://content.pivotal.io/intersect/objection-inversion-why-platform-ops-can-create-new-champions-in-it]]> Upcoming Events 3/18-3/22, Greenplum Summit at Postgres Conf, New York <[[ https://pivotal.io/event/greenplum-summit]]>
